info.description: This is a PDC data server.
info.title: PDC API

get.description:
Returns case ID.

Parameters:
  • case_submitter_id
  • project_submitter_id
  • disease_type

Returns a list of experiment types, example: Label Free, iTRAQ4, TMT10.

Parameters:
  • experiment_type: Name of experiment type
  • tissue_or_organ_of_origin: Text term that describes the anatomic site of the tumor or disease. caDSR: 3427536, example: Breast
  • disease_type

Returns all available programs.

Parameters:
  • program_submitter_id: Text term for the structural pattern of cancer cells used to define a microscopic diagnosis caDSR: 3081934, example : Mucinous Carcinoma
  • name: Text term that describes the anatomic site of the tumor or disease. caDSR: 3427536, example: Breast
  • Sponsor: Name of experiment type
  • start_date: Text term for the structural pattern of cancer cells used to define a microscopic diagnosis caDSR: 3081934, example : Mucinous Carcinoma
  • end_date: Text term that describes the anatomic site of the tumor or disease. caDSR: 3427536, example: Breast
  • program_manager: Name of experiment type
  • projects

get.summary: Get spectral counts of available projects for an aliquot
get.description: Returns spectral counts of available projects for an aliquot

parameters.name: dataset_alias
parameters.description: ID of aliquot to return, example: A2-A0D0-01A

get.description: Returns a single case

parameters.name: case_submitter_id
parameters.description: ID of case to return, example: 01BR001

get.description: Returns a list of search records

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Partial case_submitter_id to search cases with, example: TCGA-61

get.description:
Returns a list of diseases.

Parameters:
  • disease_type
  • tissue_or_organ_of_origin: Text term that describes the anatomic site of the tumor or disease. caDSR: 3427536, example: Breast
  • project_submitter_id
  • cases_count

Returns a list of disease types.

Parameters:
    project_submitter_id
  • experiment_type
  • analytical_fraction
  • cases {disease_type count}

Returns all records with counts of files per study per file type.
Parameters:
  • study_submitter_id: ID of a study
  • file_type
  • files_count

Returns a list of files per study.
Takes a long time to execute because of the huge volume of data.

Parameters:
  • study_id
  • study_submitter_id
  • study_name
  • file_id
  • file_name
  • file_submitter_id
  • file_type
  • md5sum
  • file_location
  • file_size
Returns a list of search records

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Partial gene_name to search genes with, example:42EP

get.summary: Get spectral counts of available projects for a Gene
get.description: Returns spectral counts of available projects for a gene

parameters.name: gene_name
parameters.description: HGNC gene ID of the gene to return, example: A1BG

get.description: Returns a list of file metadata
Returns a list of cases and a pagination record
Returns a list of files and a pagination record

Returns cases/demographics per study
Takes a long time to execute because of the huge volume of data.

get.summary: Get data matrix of spectral counts or quantitative data
get.description:
Returns data matrix of spectral counts or quantitative data.Takes a long time to execute because of the huge volume of data.
Please refer to this table for possible parameter values:
study_type label_type study extension (e.g., S015-1) available_data_types
proteome label-free -1 spectral_count, precursor_area, precursor_area_unshared
proteome iTRAQ/TMT -1 log2_ratio, unshared_log2_ratio
phospho iTRAQ/TMT 2 log_ratio

parameters.name: study_submitter_id
parameters.description: Submitter id of study, example: S015-2

parameters.name: data_type
parameters.description: Type of data in matrix, example: Please refer to the above table for a possible data type.

get.description: Returns spectral counts per study/aliquot/gene

parameters.name: study_submitter_id
parameters.description: Submitter id of study, example: S015-2

get.description:
Gets all PDC statistics.

Parameters
  • program
  • study
  • spectra
  • protein
  • project
  • program
  • peptide
  • data_size
  • data_label
  • data_file
Returns a single program with its projects

parameters.name: program_submitter_id
parameters.description: ID of program to return, example: CPTAC

get.description:
Returns a hierarchy of programs/projects/studies for an optional filter value.

Parameters:
  • program_id
  • program_submitter_id
  • name
  • sponsor
  • start_date
  • end_date
  • program_manager
  • projects {project_id project_submitter_id name}
  • studies {study_id submitter_id_name study_submitter_id analytical_fraction experiment_type acquisition_type}

Returns a list of projects per experiment types - Label Free, iTRAQ4, TMT10.

Parameters:
  • experiment_type
  • project_submitter_id
  • name

Returns a list of projects per mass spectrometry instrument, example: Lumos.

Parameters
  • project_submitter_id

get.summary: Get spectral counts and plex in available projects for a protein
get.description: Returns spectral counts of available projects for gene to which the protein ID (Uniprot or Refseq) mapped

parameters.name: protein
parameters.description: Name of protein to return, example: M0R009

get.summary: Get quantitive data per study and/or experiment_type
get.description:
Returns quantitive data per study and/or experiment_type
Takes a long time to execute because of the huge volume of data.
Returns a list of search records

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Partial study_shortname to search studies with, example: TCGA

get.description: Returns cases/diagnoses per study

Returns a list of Tissue Sites.

Parameters
  • tissue_or_organ_of_origin:Text term that describes the anatomic site of the tumor or disease. caDSR: 3427536, example: Breast
  • project_submitter_id
  • cases_count
Returns a list of workflow metadata

get.summary: Find clinical metadata for a study
get.description: Returns clinical metadata for a study

get.summary: Find experimental metadata for a study
get.description: Returns experimental metadata for a study
Returns a list of cases, samples amd aliquot records

Returns all cases for a file.
Parameters:
  • file_id: ID of a File
  • case_id
  • case_submitter_id

search_database_parameters.example: java –Xmx3500M –jar MSGFPlus.jar -d <file>.fasta -t 20ppm -e 1 -m (3 for QExactive, 1 for Orbitrap) -inst (1 for QExactive, 1 for Orbitrap) -ntt 1 -thread 2 -tda 1 -ti 0,1 -n 1 -maxLength 50 -mod <file>.txt
